sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Sexual Assault Incident Procedure Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Sexual Assault Incident Procedure Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings.  The General Assembly finds:
sections.text: Legislative findings. The General Assembly finds:

sections.heading: Victim notification. When sexual assault evidence is collected from a sexual assault survivor, the health care provider or law enforcement officer who collects the evidence must notify a victim about the tracking system

sections.heading: Third-party reports. A victim of sexual assault or sexual abuse may give a person consent to provide information about the sexual assault or sexual abuse to a law enforcement officer, and the officer shall complete a written report unless:
